author: dimvar
message:
PR #34116: Added spec for Blackwell Ultra (B300)

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/34116

Copybara import of the project:

546ee7da30ca7c70030d12db473d216010889cc8 by Dimitris Vardoulakis <dvardoulakis@nvidia.com>:

Added spec for Blackwell Ultra (B300)

Merging this change closes #34116

+  threads_per_block_limit: 1024
+  threads_per_warp: 32
+  shared_memory_per_block: 49152

+  threads_per_core_limit: 2048
+  core_count: 158
+  fpus_per_core: 128
+  block_dim_limit_x: 2147483647
+  block_dim_limit_y: 65535
+  block_dim_limit_z: 65535
+  memory_bandwidth: 7936000000000
+  l2_cache_size: 135528448
+  clock_rate_ghz: 1.965
+  device_memory_size: 297021865984
+  shared_memory_per_block_optin: 232448

+    major: 10
+    minor: 3
+  }
+  registers_per_core_limit: 65536

+}
+platform_name: "CUDA"
+dnn_version_info {

+  minor: 9
+}
+device_description_str: "NVIDIA B300"
